segments.text: I can ’ t find my purse . Have you seen it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ Ve looked everywhere for it . I must have left it somewhere . I hope I haven ’ t lost it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Perhaps you left that at school .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I had it when I left school this afternoon .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well . Didn ’ t you go around to the Smith after school ? You might have left it there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I ’ d better give her a call now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But she can ’ t be home now . She might have gone to the library .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Perhaps I should call her later .
segments.speaker: S1
